original_text: Then they tore their clothes, and every man loaded his donkey, and they returned to the city.
korean_text: 그들이 옷을 찢고 각기 짐을 나귀에 싣고 성으로 돌아 가니라

sentences.original_text: and every man loaded his donkey
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람은 자기 나귀에 짐을 싣고

sentences.original_text: and they returned to the city
